jdbcService.sql: select a.id, a.created, a.modified, a.parent_id, a.type, a.sub_type, a.size, a.width, a.height, a.name, a.title, a.description, a.uri, a.external, a.language_id, a.attachment_group_id, a.meta, a.owner_id, a.node_id from node_attachments a join master_data_entries m on a.attachment_group_id = m.id where a.parent_id = :parentId and m.name = :attachmentGroup
